synopsis: In episode #13, Devam shares his transformative journey after quitting his job, embracing a break to explore new passions like DJing and painting. He reflects on the importance of self-connection, the pressures of productivity, and the value of living in the moment, all while navigating the complexities of modern life.
quotes: You need to have a good day every day. I need to feel fulfilled in some way.
We're not on this planet to slave away and be productivity monkeys creating value for our bosses.
Sometimes it's enough to just breathe. That's okay.
If you have privilege, you should use it.
It's important to recognize why you're doing something and the context of why your surroundings are the way they are.
I was stuck in a rut ... I needed some space to untangle myself.
Let it be on my own terms; I want to do it because I like it.
The goal of this break is to learn how to breathe.
You should get maybe good at one or two things at a time.
If you're going into a room full of people that you actually don't like, then don't go.
